title: Never tell anyone they are useless just because of the champion they play
body:
As a Gangplank main, I get people telling me things like "Well you're expected to be useless, you're GP after all" or "Don't pick Gangplank, he's useless" regardless of how good of a player I am with him. When people say things like this to me I feel outraged to the point where I would love nothing more than to flame them. I've been maining Gangplank this entire season and I currently have a 4.11 KDA with him; does that sound useless to you?

My point is, please don't make your teammates feel terrible just because they're playing a slightly unconventional champion or a viable champion in an unconventional role. They may be extremely good at it, yet you'll never be able to find that out since you pissed them off so much.
